item.title: Albania! YEEEEHAWWW!
item.description:
Howdy! My name is Gordon Burgett and I’m going to Albania this summer. I first went in the summer of 2013, and fell in love with both the people and the mission. Since that time I’ve been back and forth every summer, and a few stints in between.

We’re continuing the work we’ve been doing over the past 8+ years. As the Poland Re:Generation project matures, we’re starting to look into new ways we can support the native staff and church members in Albania and b...
